title: Finding Us
description: Tate & Low's story.I'm loud, I'm proud, and I like to bust balls in my spare time. At least, that's what Low Parker would do. But she is just a mask, one I have perfected over years of running. I am Willow Knoxx. Master of deception, secrets, and lies. I am the girl your mother told you to stay away from, and the girl your father fantasized about. I have been running for years, always looking over my shoulder. Now, the mask I have perfected is about to disappear, and everything I have done to keep myself hidden is about to be revealed.
author: S.K. Hartley
